GOD.content: literature, place of secrets w/out secrecy, all these crypts w/out depth, no other basis than abyss of call or address; only law: singularity of event called the work (l’oeuvre)
GOD.linkedContent: literature, place of secrets w/out secrecy, all these crypts w/out depth, no other basis than abyss of call or address; only law: singularity of event called the work (l’oeuvre)

GT.content: reader is not deceived [like narrator], experiences a secret w/out depth, a secret w/out secret
GT.linkedContent: reader is not deceived [like narrator], experiences a secret w/out depth, a secret w/out secret

GT.content: [no depth beyond literary phenomenon] inviolability of secret depends on essential superficiality, bare device of being-two-to-speak (l’être-deux-à-parler), a secret beyond reserve of technique, thing, being, thing thought (same could be said for money)
GT.linkedContent: [no depth beyond literary phenomenon] inviolability of secret depends on essential superficiality, bare device of being-two-to-speak (l’être-deux-à-parler), a secret beyond reserve of technique, thing, being, thing thought (same could be said for money)

GT.content: secret of literature has no depth, no interiority, spread on the surface of the page, non-psychological structure, not subjective though responsible for most radical effects of subjectivity, a post card, a bank note, a “letter of credit”  [see LOBL p. ~101, & SUBJECTILE]
GT.linkedContent: secret of literature has no depth, no interiority, spread on the surface of the page, non-psychological structure, not subjective though responsible for most radical effects of subjectivity, a post card, a bank note, a “letter of credit” [see LOBL p. ~101, & SUBJECTILE]

AF.content: psychoanalysis is not a depth psychology

MSUBJ.content: subjectile is everything distinct from form, from sense & representation, skin w/holes for pores [Irigaray] > “its presumed depth or thickness can only be seen as a surface,” a flat succubi
MSUBJ.linkedContent: subjectile is everything distinct from form, from sense & representation, skin w/holes for pores [Irigaray] > “its presumed depth or thickness can only be seen as a surface,” a flat succubi

PP.content: opposition btwn mnēmē and hypomnēsis institutes all oppositions of Platonism, the boundary line is major decision of philosophy, maintains, institutes itself, contains its fond advers
PP.linkedContent: opposition btwn mnēmē and hypomnēsis institutes all oppositions of Platonism, the boundary line is major decision of philosophy, maintains, institutes itself, contains its fond advers

PP.content: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself

PAS.content: “Viens” upsurges (surgit) from a groundless ground (fond sans fond) of an indefinite past
PAS.linkedContent: “Viens” upsurges (surgit) from a groundless ground (fond sans fond) of an indefinite past

PAS.content: Blanchot: “more secret and more interior than speech of the innermost heart” > “the secret is w/out depth (sans profondeur)”
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot: “more secret and more interior than speech of the innermost heart” > “the secret is w/out depth (sans profondeur)”

PAS.content: near depthless abyss in mise en scène of “Viens”
PAS.linkedContent: near depthless abyss in mise en scène of “Viens”

PAS.content: border edge, hidden vicinity (un voisinage caché) [not depth]
PAS.linkedContent: border edge, hidden vicinity (un voisinage caché) [not depth]

S.content: [re: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address] le profond et l’altier (haughty) allied in most high: highest of what guides the spiritual guides of die hohe Schule and depths of forces of earth and blood
S.linkedContent: [re: Heidegger’s Rectorship Address] le profond et l’altier (haughty) allied in most high: highest of what guides the spiritual guides of die hohe Schule and depths of forces of earth and blood

S.content: [Heidegger appeals to depth (Tiefe) positively, sees destitution (Entmachtung) of spirit/world as a flattening, where dimension has become extension & number]
S.linkedContent: [Heidegger appeals to depth (Tiefe) positively, sees destitution (Entmachtung) of spirit/world as a flattening, where dimension has become extension & number]

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s upheaval of ‘O my friends…’ [in Human All…] plays w/ a tradition deeper & wider than we can fathom
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s upheaval of ‘O my friends…’ [in Human All…] plays w/ a tradition deeper & wider than we can fathom

FSW.content: Mystic Pad depth w/out bottom, stratification of surfaces, whose interior is a similarly exposed surface, perfectly superficial exteriority open to incision of scratch
FSW.linkedContent: Mystic Pad depth w/out bottom, stratification of surfaces, whose interior is a similarly exposed surface, perfectly superficial exteriority open to incision of scratch

FSW.content: Freud’s Writing Pad (machine) can’t run of itself (like living memory of Plato), a dead complexity w/out depth, multiplicity of layered surfaces
FSW.linkedContent: Freud’s Writing Pad (machine) can’t run of itself (like living memory of Plato), a dead complexity w/out depth, multiplicity of layered surfaces

FSW.content: “life as depth belongs only to the wax of psychical memory,” Plato’s mnemic writing
FSW.linkedContent: “life as depth belongs only to the wax of psychical memory,” Plato’s mnemic writing

PPHS.content: Vorstellung, remembered-interiorized intuition; Erinnerung, interiorized memory, places images in reserve, like water in unconscious pit, like vein at bottom of mine > permits passage to conceptuality
PPHS.linkedContent: Vorstellung, remembered-interiorized intuition; Erinnerung, interiorized memory, places images in reserve, like water in unconscious pit, like vein at bottom of mine > permits passage to conceptuality

PPHS.content: possession of pit > gives forth its property, produces light
PPHS.linkedContent: possession of pit > gives forth its property, produces light

PPHS.content: Hegel reassembles the feminine law (singularity, sepulcher, night, the divine) around the pit and the pyramid (feminine law only effective in the underworld not on earth)
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel reassembles the feminine law (singularity, sepulcher, night, the divine) around the pit and the pyramid (feminine law only effective in the underworld not on earth)

PPHS.content: the sign, “the height conserving in its depths the hegemony of the soul,” is the pyramid [later, Derrida will live through this tomb not, like Hegel, by negating it]
PPHS.linkedContent: the sign, “the height conserving in its depths the hegemony of the soul,” is the pyramid [later, Derrida will live through this tomb not, like Hegel, by negating it]

DS.content: désertant toute profondeur, chacune de ses faces est aussi, après coup, tout le dé [each surface, once die is cast, is the whole of it]
DS.linkedContent: désertant toute profondeur, chacune de ses faces est aussi, après coup, tout le dé [each surface, once die is cast, is the whole of it]

ROP.content: la restance disséminale, hyperbolythique, destined (vouée) to chance, to ash, à un oubli radical, trace w/out trace: secret w/out depth, lieu, nom, destination, lysis w/out measure/return/anagogy
ROP.linkedContent: la restance disséminale, hyperbolythique, destined (vouée) to chance, to ash, à un oubli radical, trace w/out trace: secret w/out depth, lieu, nom, destination, lysis w/out measure/return/anagogy

SP.content: woman but one name for untruth of truth, depthless depths that distorts identity, essence, property, brings philosophy to ruin
SP.linkedContent: woman but one name for untruth of truth, depthless depths that distorts identity, essence, property, brings philosophy to ruin

SP.content: Nietzsche: modesty of life, veils: “Yes, life is a woman!” [see p. 59 truth becomes profound by disguising of pudendum, by modest veil that falls over it]
SP.linkedContent: Nietzsche: modesty of life, veils: “Yes, life is a woman!” [see p. 59 truth becomes profound by disguising of pudendum, by modest veil that falls over it]

SP.content: pratique stylet, pratique stylée, de quel genre? can’t be written w/out conjoined fabulation of woman/truth, entre la femme, in spite of the profundity that is modesty
SP.linkedContent: pratique stylet, pratique stylée, de quel genre? can’t be written w/out conjoined fabulation of woman/truth, entre la femme, in spite of the profundity that is modesty

SP.content: Nietzsche: “women are considered profound, why? because one never fathoms their depths, women aren’t even shallow”
SP.linkedContent: Nietzsche: “women are considered profound, why? because one never fathoms their depths, women aren’t even shallow”

SP.content: Heidegger’s abyssal structure of the proper, at once superficial & bottomless (since not fundamental), the proper founders, passes into the other
SP.linkedContent: Heidegger’s abyssal structure of the proper, at once superficial & bottomless (since not fundamental), the proper founders, passes into the other

PS.content: Artaud seeks a depth of illegibility
PS.linkedContent: Artaud seeks a depth of illegibility

FS.content: panoramagram (image of structuralist instrument): obtain on flat surface, depth of objects on horizon > one can glance at field divested of its forces
FS.linkedContent: panoramagram (image of structuralist instrument): obtain on flat surface, depth of objects on horizon > one can glance at field divested of its forces

FS.content: philosophy as twilight of forces, “sun-splashed (ensoleillé)” morning of images, forms, phenomena > matin des idées et des idoles, où le relief des forces devient repos, aplatit sa profondeur dans la lumière et s'étend dans l'horizontalité
FS.linkedContent: philosophy as twilight of forces, “sun-splashed (ensoleillé)” morning of images, forms, phenomena > matin des idées et des idoles, où le relief des forces devient repos, aplatit sa profondeur dans la lumière et s'étend dans l'horizontalité

FS.content: writing, moment of depth as decay > original valley of the other w/in Being; incidence & insistence of inscription
FS.linkedContent: writing, moment of depth as decay > original valley of the other w/in Being; incidence & insistence of inscription

DIF.content: differance (is) older than ontological difference: outside epochality of Being (outside epoch): no depth to bottomless chessboard on which Being is put to play
DIF.linkedContent: differance (is) older than ontological difference: outside epochality of Being (outside epoch): no depth to bottomless chessboard on which Being is put to play

O.content: logos spermatikos, philosophy of the seed, romanticism, myth of semantic depth, genetic pro-gram [quoting from OG]
O.linkedContent: logos spermatikos, philosophy of the seed, romanticism, myth of semantic depth, genetic pro-gram [quoting from OG]

D.content: Soller’s open square: open side, air, mirror, veil
D.linkedContent: Soller’s open square: open side, air, mirror, veil

D.content: Soller: single sheet gives sensation of depth, representation, reflection
D.linkedContent: Soller: single sheet gives sensation of depth, representation, reflection

D.content: thickness (l’épaisseur) of text opens upon beyond of a whole, nothing or absolute outside: its depth (sa profondeur) at once null & infinite—each layer (couche) harbors (en abrite) another
D.linkedContent: thickness (l’épaisseur) of text opens upon beyond of a whole, nothing or absolute outside: its depth (sa profondeur) at once null & infinite—each layer (couche) harbors (en abrite) another

D.content: au bord (du vertige), alert to the border itself, infinite depths were also bottomless, perfectly superficial, cube w/out depth
D.linkedContent: au bord (du vertige), alert to the border itself, infinite depths were also bottomless, perfectly superficial, cube w/out depth

TN.content: always writing a story, tangent touches line/surface w/out intersection, a tangent touches one point, point is nothing, a limit w/out depth or surface, untouchable even as a figure
TN.linkedContent: always writing a story, tangent touches line/surface w/out intersection, a tangent touches one point, point is nothing, a limit w/out depth or surface, untouchable even as a figure

BSi.content: talk of the bottom (fond), the profound, believing in depth [of “who” or “what”] will never be free from bêtise (stupidity) > sovereign & beast as bottomless bottom, abyss, vertigo
BSi.linkedContent: talk of the bottom (fond), the profound, believing in depth [of “who” or “what”] will never be free from bêtise (stupidity) > sovereign & beast as bottomless bottom, abyss, vertigo

BSi.content: acc. Deleuze, psychoanalytic bêtise privileges depth of fantasy over planar affect, becoming-assemblage
BSi.linkedContent: acc. Deleuze, psychoanalytic bêtise privileges depth of fantasy over planar affect, becoming-assemblage

OG.content: the horizontality of spacing, hollow of differance, discontinuity and discreteness (does not oppose it(self) like surface to depth), a hinge (brisure) marking impossibility of full speech
OG.linkedContent: the horizontality of spacing, hollow of differance, discontinuity and discreteness (does not oppose it(self) like surface to depth), a hinge (brisure) marking impossibility of full speech

SPEC.content: speculation as provisional floating, distances from intuition, impartiality, science, psychology of depths
SPEC.linkedContent: speculation as provisional floating, distances from intuition, impartiality, science, psychology of depths

FV.content: depth is height, flows out (débouche) toward the high, precisely the mouth (bouche) in which is “incarnated” the Nous, Logos, phallic signifier > reason is reason itself, aura raison, logic of kettle (a check [traite] drawn from reason): there is only one libido, it is masculine in nature
FV.linkedContent: depth is height, flows out (débouche) toward the high, precisely the mouth (bouche) in which is “incarnated” the Nous, Logos, phallic signifier > reason is reason itself, aura raison, logic of kettle (a check [traite] drawn from reason): there is only one libido, it is masculine in nature

FV.content: one reason, male libido, altus, at the bottom of things—highest truth
FV.linkedContent: one reason, male libido, altus, at the bottom of things—highest truth
